page.title: 20MARYCULTER CREDIT THANKS
page.content: Credits:Martin Hastie,David Hawkins, Lynne Ballance for glimpses into their lifestyles;Zana Grant,Joanne Bennett for notes on roses;Austin Grant notes on Camphill;Stuart Chisholm and Peter Lowson salmon research;Mark Connon on Knights Templar;Ken Hepburn on caravan site;Sally Scott and Gordon Browning on local news;Rhona Smith and Steven Lloyd on Kincausie;Bruce Ballance report on Eagles;Claire and Jane Lowson notes on local government. Thanks:Mr.J.I.Fortescue,Anderson's Roses,Mr.Mitchell,Mrs.Murdock,Camphill staff,Councillor Needham,Mrs Love, Mrs.Grant,Mrs.Ballance and Mrs.Smith. Dr.T.Hawkins for all his encouragement and photography.Thanks too to many others who answered all our questions. Lastly Andrew Lowson and others for typing in material.
